author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 10-month-old baby died on Tuesday due to electrocution near Thirubhuvanai. Police sources said the incident occurred when the deceased child Deepak was playing at home in the evening.

The boy’s father Ramasamy is a farmer at Silukaripalayam near Thirubhivanai. The mother kept the switch on the water heater in a bowl. While the water was boiling, the child crawled and touched the water. The child died instantaneously due to electrocution. Thirubhuvanai police recovered the body and sent it for post-mortem.
title: Baby electrocuted
